## IEvents.entitiesOutOfBoundaries property

After checking entities outside the fences, if any is outside, this event will be triggered with all the entities outside the scene.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
entitiesOutOfBoundaries: {
        entities: string[];
    };
```
